title: Unlock the potential of digital accessibility for nonprofits | Torchbox | Torchbox

metadata.description: Digital experiences still exclude people with disabilities, which misses opportunities for engagement and creates significant barriers to participation. To raise awareness of this crucial issue, we hosted a webinar in collaboration with the RNIB and Nonprofit Tech for Good.
